name: A Die in the Dark
description:
Roll a die at the beginning of each level that determines how many lights turn on. Reach the door at the end while your vision is obscured, relying on your memory and enviornmental cues to remember where to go.

HOW TO PLAY:

WASD / arrow keys to move, space bar to jump and roll the die

Get to the door at the end of each level. Lights will reveal details about the environment. There are other clues, such as cameras and wires, which you can use to map the area in your head.
